short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: get chatgpt like user interface in claude for light mode

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The extension transforms Claude's user interface to match ChatGPT's aesthetic and layout, creating a familiar experience for users who prefer ChatGPT's design language while retaining Claude's powerful functionality.
